steps: Identify rumor relevance to current scene or downtime focus.
Use deterministic dice to determine clarity shift (1-5 obscures, 6-15 unchanged, 16-20 clarifies).
Select a new carrier NPC or location based on faction proximity and tone dial.
Log the spread with affected factions and any mutations.

scene_guidance.social: NPC attitudes shift one step toward rumor truth when persuasion succeeds.
scene_guidance.horror: Rumors grow darker adjectives and gain fear-driven distortions.
